entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending early this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few showers. High 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few showers beginning late in the morning. Fog patches in the morning. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southeast 40 near noon except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia in the afternoon. High 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers. Wind southeast 40 km/h except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia in the evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 08 January 2023
